tutorial_p1: ^Since this is your first time playing, let me walk you over the basics.
^What, you thought I, Infernal Beelzebub Anarchia Cruul de Apokalypsi,
^the Opposite of Divine, Prince of Suffering and Torment, Master of all Sin,
^Conqueror of the Underworld, and King of all Demonkind,
^could let you go into action right away? Don't make me laugh!
^Okay, I'll unlock your controls right about... now.
^Alright, you can move freely. Use the <u>WASD</u> or the <u>Arrow keys</u>.
^Impressive, you're already getting used to it.
^See the wall of bullets on the right? No way you're passing that.
^Good thing you can dash right through. Just press <u>Space</u> or the <u>Right Mouse Button</u>.

c-1: ^I must admit, not bad at all.

tutorial_p2: ^Just don't forget you can avoid bullets this way.
^And now we come to the real thing.
^I'll have one of my peasants, Miguel, help you. He's your final challenge for today.
^Defeat him in battle, and we will wrap it up.
^Oh, you're worried about hurting my subordinate?
^Don't sweat it, that bird brain sold his soul to me a long time ago.
^Aim with your mouse and shoot by holding the <u>Left Mouse Button</u>. Go ahead!
^That will teach him a lesson or two!
^Look! Somebody from your chat donated $100, and it was enough to meet the stream goal.
^Each time this happens, you can choose one of the three random power-ups.
^Navigate through them and use <u>Space</u> to make the choice.
^Glad you're putting my powers to good use.
^Can't believe I'm saying this, but... Show them what you're made of!
